body:
### Problem

Getting below error when updating with brew

```sh
❮ brew update && brew upgrade
Already up-to-date.
==> Upgrading 1 outdated package:
neovim HEAD-55f6a1c -> HEAD-55f6a1c
==> Fetching neovim
==> Downloading https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/cdab394ac51c78d07bb82b1be3e4a0510330a60c/Formula/n/neovim.rb
######################################################################################################################################################## 100.0%
==> Cloning https://github.com/neovim/neovim.git
Updating /Users/ghar/Library/Caches/Homebrew/neovim--git
==> Checking out branch master
Already on 'master'
Your branch is up to date with 'origin/master'.
HEAD is now at a6e74c1f0 docs: fix typos and other small fixes (#25005)
==> Upgrading neovim
  HEAD-55f6a1c -> HEAD-a6e74c1 

==> cmake -S . -B build -DLUV_LIBRARY=/usr/local/opt/luv/lib/libluv.dylib -DLIBUV_LIBRARY=/usr/local/opt/libuv/lib/libuv.dylib -DLPEG_LIBRARY=/usr/local/opt/lp
==> cmake --build build
Last 15 lines from /Users/ghar/Library/Logs/Homebrew/neovim/02.cmake:
cd /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/src/nvim && /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/shims/mac/super/clang -Dnlua0_EXPORTS -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/cmake.config -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/include -isystem /usr/local/include/luajit-2.1 -O3 -DNDEBUG -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5.2 -fPIC  -Wno-conversion -Wno-missing-noreturn -Wno-missing-format-attribute -Wno-double-promotion -Wno-strict-prototypes -Wno-misleading-indentation -MD -MT src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/lmpack.c.o -MF CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/lmpack.c.o.d -o CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/lmpack.c.o -c /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src/mpack/lmpack.c
[  0%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/mpack_core.c.o
cd /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/src/nvim && /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/shims/mac/super/clang -Dnlua0_EXPORTS -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/cmake.config -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/include -isystem /usr/local/include/luajit-2.1 -O3 -DNDEBUG -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5.2 -fPIC  -Wno-conversion -Wno-missing-noreturn -Wno-missing-format-attribute -Wno-double-promotion -Wno-strict-prototypes -Wno-misleading-indentation -MD -MT src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/mpack_core.c.o -MF CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/mpack_core.c.o.d -o CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/mpack_core.c.o -c /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src/mpack/mpack_core.c
[  0%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/nlua0.c.o
[  0%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/object.c.o
cd /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/src/nvim && /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/shims/mac/super/clang -Dnlua0_EXPORTS -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/cmake.config -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/include -isystem /usr/local/include/luajit-2.1 -O3 -DNDEBUG -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5.2 -fPIC -MD -MT src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/nlua0.c.o -MF CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/nlua0.c.o.d -o CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/nlua0.c.o -c /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src/nlua0.c
cd /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/src/nvim && /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/shims/mac/super/clang -Dnlua0_EXPORTS -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/cmake.config -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/include -isystem /usr/local/include/luajit-2.1 -O3 -DNDEBUG -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5.2 -fPIC  -Wno-conversion -Wno-missing-noreturn -Wno-missing-format-attribute -Wno-double-promotion -Wno-strict-prototypes -Wno-misleading-indentation -MD -MT src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/object.c.o -MF CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/object.c.o.d -o CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/object.c.o -c /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src/mpack/object.c
[  4%] Building C object src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/conv.c.o
cd /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/src/nvim && /usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/shims/mac/super/clang -Dnlua0_EXPORTS -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/cmake.config -I/tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/build/include -isystem /usr/local/include/luajit-2.1 -O3 -DNDEBUG -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX13.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=13.5.2 -fPIC  -Wno-conversion -Wno-missing-noreturn -Wno-missing-format-attribute -Wno-double-promotion -Wno-strict-prototypes -Wno-misleading-indentation -MD -MT src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/conv.c.o -MF CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/conv.c.o.d -o CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/__/mpack/conv.c.o -c /tmp/neovim-20230914-35741-pdkh0h/src/mpack/conv.c
make[1]: *** [src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nlua0.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
-- Using NVIM_VERSION: v0.10.0-dev-1100+ga6e74c1f0-Homebrew
[  4%] Built target update_version_stamp
make: *** [all] Error 2


READ THIS: https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting
```

### Steps to reproduce

Run `brew update && brew upgrade`

### Expected behavior

homebrew should install latest neovim head

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.10.0-dev-415+g55f6a1cab-Homebrew

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

I am not using vim

### Operating system/version

MacOS 13.5

### Terminal name/version

Kitty

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-256color

### Installation

brew install --HEAD neovim

comment_data.body: Not sure if this is related https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/commit/e2b50a39690e6e12ee13ee014f9e942dc45ae425

Run below command to fix this issue

`brew uninstall --ignore-dependencies lpeg`

title: Homebrew update error
